function.name: thermostatMode-turnOn
function.description: This function is used to turn on the thermostat mode of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to turn on the thermostat mode.

predefinedThermostatMode.description: The predefined thermostat mode to turn on.

mode.description: The mode to turn on the thermostat.
